dialogues.text: (laughing) Oh, no! Not the mega-tushy! Noooo!

dialogues.speaker: MURRAY
dialogues.text: What’s this now? As Dennis laughs, Dracula hears a faint sound from his ph and takes it out.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: What? It’s Mavis??

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Hang up! You must've butt-dialed her.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Why would my butt do that to me?

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Murray's tushy did it! EXT. JOHNNY’S PARENTS HOUSE - ROOFTOP - CONTINUOUS Mavis takes her ringing phone, sees Dracula’s number. It disconnects. She is puzzled.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: She’s gonna call back!! The phone starts ringing.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 76.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Okay. Don’t panic. There’s an app that can help us here.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Who’s an app?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: (scrolling) I just need a picture of the hotel. Ah! Got it! Looka that! Wayne shows Dracula that they are keyed into the backgrou photo of the hotel.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: That’s insane, man! It’s like voodoo stuff.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: What are you playing with?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: This is the best, Denisovich! Now we're going to play where we pretend we’re at home! We’re gonna play with Mommy, she loves this game! Okay??

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Yay! More pretend! Dracula answers the phone innocently. INTERCUT with Mavis the roof.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Yes! Hello?

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Hi Mommy!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Hi Dennis! My little everything! I love you! Are you having fun?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Yes! We’re having fun, at home!

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Yes! We’re watching Cakey the Cake Monster on the TV!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 77.

dialogues.speaker: CELLMATE
dialogues.text: Hey shut up! Tryin’ to sleep here!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Heh! That’s the TV show..?

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: That doesn’t sound like Cakey...

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: That's Cakey’s, eh, friend, Mr. Sleepy! Dracula quickly waves his finger causing Frankenstein's t bunk to collapse on his Cellmate in the lower bunk.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (aside to Wayne) Where’s the volume button? Dracula looks but accidentally hits the wrong button.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: No, no, no. Their background changes to a beach, a stock image from t app.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: What’s going yon?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Nothing, we’re home. Wayne frantically grabs the phone and scrolls. They appea be in front of a rollercoaster now.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: You are not home!

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: (waving his hands) Ha ha! Yay! Rollercoaster!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Ehh...a rollercoaster...whee! Dracula and Wayne desperately wave their hands and shake their faces like they’re absorbing the force of a rollercoaster as Dennis grabs the phone.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 78.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: I wanna play! Dennis scrolls it this time...and pulls up the real image the jail cell! But Dracula and Wayne are oblivious, continuing as if they’re on the fake rollercoaster.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: What are you doing?!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Heh... we're rollercoastering.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Look! Jail!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Jail??

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: (realizing, covering) Heh, look at that! He’s pretending he’s in jail! Suddenly, Murray crashes through, half torn up and crying

dialogues.speaker: MURRAY
dialogues.text: He wiped with me! He wiped with me!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: I am coming home right now. And you better be there! Or I swear, Dad, you're gonna be very sorry! Mavis hangs up the phone and immediately runs down the wa of the house, hyperventilating. Johnny struggles to climb down quickly.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: What’s going on?!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: I think Dad and Dennis are in jail!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Whhhaaat?

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: We need to get home right away!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Okay. I’1l go wake up my backpack!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 79.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Gimme that! Dracula grabs the phone from Wayne and dials, digging his long fingernails into the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A phone in mid-air rings. It’s Griffin, who managed to av being arrested. He speaks quietly as he’s “hiding” outsid

dialogues.speaker: GRIFFIN
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: It’s time to break human laws. Griffin sighs and removes his glasses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we hear Griffin nervously moan, a FLOATING KEY opens t door to the cells. It floats past the oblivious DEPUTY, wearing headphones and listening to the same pop tune.

dialogues.speaker: CELLMATE
dialogues.text: What the -- ? The cellmate pushes Murray aside but appears to be slappe the face, left, then right, then kicked in the nuts by Gr as everyone else hustles out. The Deputy finally notices.

dialogues.speaker: DEPUTY
dialogues.text: Hey! Griffin tickles the Deputy, who is helpless with laughter the others get away. They run over to a dirt road...

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: You called the getaway car? Just then, pulling up in his Rascal scooter, is the Blob, intact but covered with dirt and grass. A stray SQUIRREL trapped in his body.

dialogues.speaker: BLOB
dialogues.text: (scolds them in blob jibberish)  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 80.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: I’m sorry, Blob, we really meant to call you sooner! They all pile on to the scooter and somehow the Blob is a to drive it, awkwardly, but still fairly fast. Dracula co up for daylight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mavis and Johnny arriving at the airport. They run up to TICKET COUNTER.

dialogues.speaker: TICKET AGENT
dialogues.text: You want to go where?

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Transylvania. Preferably an aisle seat.

dialogues.speaker: TICKET AGENT
dialogues.text: We don’t fly direct to Transylvania. You can go to Bucharest but you’1l switch planes in Chicago, and then Zurich.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: So when would we get there?

dialogues.speaker: TICKET AGENT
dialogues.text: Well, the Chicago flight’s delayed due to bad weather. Mavis suddenly makes the same crazy ROAR FACE her Dad mak The Ticket Agent is unfazed. TICKET AGENT (CONT’D) So two seats in Coach?

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: No!! Mavis, in hero pose, pulls out her poncho.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: (stunned) No.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Yes.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 81.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mavis, in poncho and transformed into a bat, lifts Johnny backpack, luggage, and all, into the sky and flies ahead. INTERCUT the MAD RACE to get back to the Hotel. - Scooter rolling along, turning sharply as everyone hold on. - Mavis bat desperately flying Johnny over Quebec.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Whoa! Quebec! One time in my hostel I got bit by a centipede and totally threw up.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Sounds cool... - Scooter hits traffic. The other drivers don’t stare.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Come on, Blobby! Squeeze through!

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Why are you mad, Papa Drac?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Oh, I just want to get home. I miss Mommy and Daddy so much.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: I miss Mommy and Daddy! And I miss -

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: You miss who? You miss that Winnie?

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Yeah. But we’re just friends.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: (chuckling) Sure, Ladykiller, that’s how it always starts. (noticing traffic) Come on! Squeeze already!! - Mavis heroically dodging lightning as the weather worse Johnny whoops excitedly and notices Dublin, Ireland.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 82.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: That’s Dublin! One time I roomed with this Croatian dude who carried around a stuffed animal in a cage. Freaky.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Trying to concentrate...

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Gotcha. - Traffic has cleared, but Blob needs to stop for a minut

dialogues.speaker: BLOB
dialogues.text: (jibberish)

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Now? When we finally have no traffic? You're killing me, Blobby!

dialogues.speaker: BLOB
dialogues.text: (angry jibberish) Dracula waits, annoyed, as the Blob pees into some bushes - A raincloud. Mavis and Johnny emerge, sopping wet, Mavi unshaken, Johnny celebrates but falls. Mavis catches him. - Dracula in slow scooter looking at his watch. He makes everyone get off.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: We're never gonna make it! Frank, blow! Frankenstein grabs the Blob by the mouth and blows him up like a balloon - bigger and bigger as everyone climbs on

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now! Frankenstein holds Blob’s mouth shut and jumps on, finall letting go. As air comes out of his mouth the Blob flies superspeed with everyone hanging on. - SUNSET - Mavis and Johnny finally see the HOTEL in the distance and Mavis’ POV frantically scans for Dennis. As the air gets less the Blob starts flying wildly like a deflating balloon but somehow he lands at the hotel. They the ground hard and roll, then pop up perfectly all toget  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 83. Dracula proudly starts to video chat Mavis. He sees her f on the phone, it’s angry.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So, hey, when are you gonna get here already? We've been waiting - He looks up. REVEAL Mavis waiting for him at the entrance with Johnny.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Give me my son.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: We just went out for some rolled oats with apricot. Mavis angrily holds up her smartphone and plays a Youtube clip titled “Miracle Rescue at Vampire Camp” with over 2 million hits. In the clip, Dennis is clearly falling from tower, screaming, before getting caught by Dracula. Busted, Dracula hands Dennis over.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Please don’t leave.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Why couldn’t you just accept who he is, Dad? We’ll have his birthday party here on Wednesday. Then we’re going. Dracula looks down, lost. His friends don’t know what to to him. INT. DRACULA’S BEDROOM - LATER Dracula stands teary eyed by the painting of Martha.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: I’m so sorry, my darling. What have I done? Dracula goes to sit on his coffin.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Why couldn’t I just let things -- Dracula feels something in his coffin and jumps up.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Gaaaah!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 84. Johnny reveals himself hiding under the blankets.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: (quietly) Is Mavis around?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: What?? No! What are you doing? Johnny immediately hugs him desperately.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Please get me out of this!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: What? What, what?

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: I don’t wanna leave the hotel! And you! And neither does Dennis!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: He doesn’t? I knew it!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY.
dialogues.text: Help us, Drac! I don't wanna go home! They want to me to get a job! At my Dad’s office! I don’t know what he does! But you have to wear shoes!! +e * HF Now he is crying. He looks at his sneakers.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You're my bestest kicks! Don’t leave my feet!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Okay, okay. Stop talking to your sneakers. I’m trying to think here! *

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: You stop! You didn’t have to do this, man. She was ready to stay! And I’ve been killing it helping this hotel! Have you seen the new band! ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny and Dracula watch from the rear as a young ZOMBIE BAND appears in a cloud of smoke on the BANDSTAND.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 85. A Zombie Boy Band! Whooo! The Zombie Boy Band dances and grunts in beautiful harmon S storm the stage and dance with joy. Only the Zombie * Composers are bitter.

dialogues.speaker: FRANKENSTEIN
dialogues.text: Awesome band, Johnny!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: (choking up) Soon I won't be here to witness all the good I’ve done. And I'll be wearing shoes.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: This cannot happen. For any of us. * But there’s one last way I can fix * this before Denisovich turns 5. *

dialogues.speaker: FRANKENSTEIN
dialogues.text: Are you saying what I think you’re * saying...?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Yes. And I'm not going alone! *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dracula grimly drives the hearse with Frankenstein. It drives down a DARK, WINDY PATH, lower and lower, until th get out of the hearse. They walk down a DARK HILL until t hit bottom. )Then they walk down a STEEP STAIRCASE made o stone until they hit bottom. Then they walk down into a LARGE HOLE. Then they crawl on their rear ends down the h as they shoo away mice and moles nipping at them. The tun finally leads to ANOTHER HOLE which they emerge out of, o to step on a STEEP CLIFF.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Oh, gimme a break already! They slide down the STEEP CLIFF, catching branches in var spots to slow their fall, finally landing on their asses. They start to walk.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Pretty sure it’s straight ahea -- They fall through a TRAP DOOR and are now falling through seemingly endless vacuum.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 86. Frank screams as Dracula shakes his head. Suddenly they l hard on their asses. They are now right in front of the D CAVE of Dracula’s father, VLAD.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Frankenstein) Can’t believe I’m doing this. Suddenly an evil-looking SENTRY jumps out from the cave causing Frankenstein to recoil.

dialogues.speaker: SENTRY
dialogues.text: Who goest there?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: It’s Count Dracula.

dialogues.speaker: SENTRY
dialogues.text: Oh....Well, it’s about time.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Just tell him I’m here. MOMENTS LATER, Dracula and Frankenstein navigate through cave’s corridors, filled with spiders and finally see two glowing eyes in the darkness. They land in the lair of VL an ancient vampire, who emerges from the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Well, look what the bat dragged in.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Yes, hi, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Fellas, you won't believe it! It’s my son, Dracula! Just as handsome as the day he deserted me! Vlad’s horrifying DEMONIC CRONIES, ancient monsters hover in shadows, howl and scream with laughter.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This is certainly unexpected, boy. It’s only been 600 years or so.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Well, maybe if you were nicer to my wife.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: She was not a pure vampire! Her great-great  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 87.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD AND DRACULA
dialogues.text: -great-great-great-great-great— great-great-great-great-great

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: -grandmother’s cousin was from Baltimore! Impure!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: She was still a full vampire --

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: IMPURE! And now you're hanging out with this thing?!

dialogues.speaker: FRANKENSTEIN
dialogues.text: Uh, nice to meet you.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: This is a monster! Frankenstein. Vlad levitates Frankenstein high off the ground with mini effort. Frankenstein screams.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: That's a monster? Screaming like a chipmunk?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Please don’t do that, Dad. Vlad drops Frankenstein, making a crack on the cave floor

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: I’m not paying for that. So what do you need from me?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: It’s my grandson, Denisovich.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Oh, you have a grandson! So your daughter got married? Never got an invitation.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Well, you know. They wanted a small wedding, and, uh, I can’t stand being around you.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: So what about this Denisovich?  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 88.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: He...hasn’t got his fangs yet.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: So? Late fanger, why are you worried? He’s a full vampire, isn’t he?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: What? Uh, yes, of course.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: So he’s got till he’s five. Which is..?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Uh...two days. Give or take an hour.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Two days! Well, there have been a few late fangers that never bloomed. But they survive.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: They survive what?

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Your basic public humiliation. Paraded through villages, forced to recite the Devil’s doctrine. A lot of wedgies.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Maybe we should help this along.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Okay, we can do that...we’ll need to, conduct a ceremony. A sacrifice. We will sacrifice the thing the kid cherishes the most.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Wow. That’s necessary? He’s just a nice little kid --

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: That’s the problem! We have to remove what’s holding him back from his dark destiny. It’s like a wussy exorcism. Of course, I’1l need his whole family present, you, Mavis, the kid’s father.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 89.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: The father?? Eh, yes, yes, fine.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: What’s the father’s bloodline, by the way?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Oh. Uh, he’s a direct descendent of the, uh, Jonafangs...of Romania.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: The Jonafangs.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Yeah...

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Okay, tomorrow I’m booked, stealing souls all night. So we’ll do this on the kid's birthday. You want to give me the address?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Okay...-he’s gonna be at my hotel.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: That’s what you do? You run a hotel?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Yeah. For monsters. Only.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Well, of course, for monsters, what else would it be for? Humans? Vlad and all the DEMONIC CRONIES laugh hard. Dracula and Frankenstein laugh along nervously.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Humans...That’s...a good one. INT. JOHNNY AND MAVIS’ BEDROOM - NIGHT Mavis is packing old items, looking depressed. She finds mobile that was over her crib as a baby and clutches it. Dennis enters the room and she quickly pulls herself toge

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Mommy?  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 90.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Oh, hey, Dennis! I was just...

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Why are we leaving Mommy? Are we leaving cebause of me?

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: What? No...it’s because, you'll, we'll be happier there.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: I’m...I’m happy here.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Wait till you see California. It’s even better. There are so many kids there...like you. Dennis is puzzled and Mavis quickly changes the subject. MAVIS (CONT’D) Are you excited about your party?

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Yeah. I was, I was worried that Cakey, that the big kids --

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Hey, do yousknow who’s coming to the party? Daddy’s whole family! Grampa Mike and Grandma Linda, and all your cousins and uncles who love you so much. And then, they’re gonna be with us when we move to California!

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Okay...

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Why don’t you go get ready for bed?

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: I didn’t have dinner yet.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Oh...I meant get ready for dinner. Dennis leaves. A SUIT OF ARMOR enters holding a bowl.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 91.

dialogues.speaker: SUIT OF ARMOR
dialogues.text: Madame. As you haven’t had anything to eat all day...your father made you this. The Suit of Armor hands her the bowl or MONSTER BALL SOUP Mavis takes it and starts to cry. The MONSTER BALLS start cry as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mavis and Johnny greeting Johnny's family the night befor the party. Dennis is introduced to his cousins, PARKER, CONNOR, and TROY. They check Dennis out and blow him off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny’s family are at a couple of long tables pushed together. As the adults chat, Dennis sits next to his cou

dialogues.speaker: CONNOR
dialogues.text: Man, I’d wanna get out of here too, little man. This place is creepy. Dennis doesn’t know what to say.

dialogues.speaker: TROY
dialogues.text: Dude you get the new Death Commando 7h!

dialogues.speaker: PARKER
dialogues.text: I got it yesterday! Kicks butt!

dialogues.speaker: TROY
dialogues.text: You got any cool video games? Something that only comes out in this freak town?

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: (sensing trouble) Um...not really.

dialogues.speaker: PARKER
dialogues.text: Come on, man, you must have some!

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Cakey Learns to Spell...

dialogues.speaker: TORY AND PARKER
dialogues.text: (laughing) Cakey’s so lame!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 92. Dennis sadly looks for support but Johnny is busy talking his dad.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: We’re raising Dennis with the Educare method, so we never say “no”, but we never say “yes”. We say “no-es”.

dialogues.speaker: GRAMPA MIKE
dialogues.text: You've had a lot of time on your hands, haven’t you, son? Having a job’s gonna be good for you.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Hi gang! I just need to borrow Johnny for one minute.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Just one? Dracula zips Johnny away quickly and they talk privately.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Okay, I spoke to my Dad. JOHNNY. You have a Dad? That’s funny.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: And we have a plan.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Yay! Awesome! What do we do?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: A sacrifice.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: A hah-ri-fi...?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Yes. And by tomorrow night, he’1l be a full vampire.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Drac, we can’t conduct a sacrifice!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Do you want to wear shoes?!!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Mmm-nnnh.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 93.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Exactly. Okay, my dad’ll set it all up. We need to sacrifice something that Dennis cherishes the most.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Oh boy. Well, there’s Cakey. We booked him for the party.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Perfect. I mean, I hate to see anyone have to go, but who’s gonna miss Cakey? Oh, one more thing.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: What’s that?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: My Dad can’t know you’re a human. Or any of your family.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: What? But Drac, I’m proud that we -

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Or you'll die. All of you.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Johnny back at the table addressing everyone.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Guess what, gang, Drac and I just decided we’re gonna make this a monster masquerade party!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: LINDA
dialogues.text: Oh, that’s lovely. Sort of a last hurrah before Dennis gets to be with normal people!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: I couldn’t have said it better.

dialogues.speaker: LINDA
dialogues.text: Oh, this’1ll be fun, we can be zombies! (immediately zombie dancing) (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 94,

dialogues.speaker: LINDA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It’s close to midnight, and something evil's lurking in the dark -- Dracula freezes Linda and the entire room.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: (venting) Oh, come on! Now I gotta hear this patronizing garbage! Why?!! Why                        ! Drac sighs and unfreezes Linda and the whole room.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Eh, heh, heh! Ah, Linda that’s terrific! Over by the Kids part of the table, Dennis is suddenly attacked by Winnie. But he’s relieved.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Winnie!

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: Come on, Dennis, let’s get away from those snotty warm noses. Zing! Zing! They crawl under the table and walk off.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: It’s nice to see you, Winnie.

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: Dennis, who are all these people? Why are they getting in between us?

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: It’s my daddy's family. They’re taking us, we’re gonna move to California.

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: Whyyy!?!

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: I dunno. Cebause my mommy said I'11 be happier in California.

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: You're happy here! With me! She knocks him over again.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 95.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: I am. But, I think they think, they think I’m not happy, cebause, I think, I’m not, I don’t have hair on my face like you. I’m sorry. It’s my fault.

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: No! You are perfect! Whether you have a hairy face or not! You're the nicest boy I know. And I have 300 brothers. Dennis takes this in. No one’s said it to him before.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Thank you, Winnie.

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: Come over here! She brings him to a window and points out toward the wood

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look! Do you see it? DENNIS. What is it? It’s a small makeshift»doghouse deep in the woods.

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: It’s a dog fort I made. We should run away together and live there. Forever.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Okay. Maybe.

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: And we can have really weird babies.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Okay. Slow down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Many HOTEL GUESTS, Monsters and Humans dressed as Monster are enjoying the party along with Johnny’s family, with w Mavis strains to fit in seamlessly.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 96.

dialogues.speaker: LINDA
dialogues.text: Oh, this is so much fun, Mavis!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Anybody want some pita sandwiches?

dialogues.speaker: LINDA
dialogues.text: There’s no, eh, bugs or snakes in it, is there?

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: No, no, all normal stuff.

dialogues.speaker: LINDA
dialogues.text: So, normal for us? Even though I’m one of you people today! She chuckles. Mavis smiles and nods, hurt. Dennis, dressed as Batman-y super hero, isn’t getting muc attention. While the other kids play together, Dennis is playing Batman alone.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Get in that jail, bad guy! Cebause I'm Batman! (assumes Dracula voice) Oh, no! Don’t hurt me, Batman! (his own voice) You better be good! Or Murray's gonna sit on you! Suddenly TROY comes over in a costume of VRAK, a freaky P Rangers villain.

dialogues.speaker: TROY
dialogues.text: Batman!! Dennis is startled and falls backwards. Troy takes off hi mask and laughs at Dennis, who’s embarrassed. Mavis looks Dennis sympathetically. Off to the side, Dracula coaches Johnny, who is dressed l a vampire, but it’s the crazy hair and flamboyant clothes Gary Oldman wore in Bram Stoker’s Dracula.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: What do you think?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: This is your vampire costume? What were you thinking?  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 97.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: I ordered it online! It was the only place that delivered overnight!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Okay, have you practiced your voice? You can’t just talk like a hippie.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: I’m not a hippie, I’m a slacker.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Talk like a vampire!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: (thick accent) My name is Count Jonafang! I ama vampire!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Okay, vampires don’t go around saying “I am a vampire!”

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Sorry. (thick accent) I am Count Jonafang! Bleh, bleh- bleh!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Seriously?

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: I'm sorry! I’m nervous!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Yeah, listen, if you think I don’t like it, you definitely don’t want to say “Bleh, bleh bleh” in front of my father.

dialogues.speaker: SUIT OF ARMOR
dialogues.text: Sir, Master Cakey has arrived. The Suit of Armor presents THE GUY WHO PLAYS CAKEY, a dul looking guy with a big bag of costume.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Oh hey. Drac, this is Brandon, aka Cakey.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: Great.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 98.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Cakey, uh, Brandon, this is the man himself, Count Dracula.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: Hey. Okay, so when does this happen? I got a book fair in half an hour.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Real soon. We’re gonna give you, uh, a big introduction to get the crowd going.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: No, man, I don’t need that. The kids are already pumped. I do seven minutes, it destroys. Let’s go. The Suit of Armor returns, floating and kicking himself i the ass.

dialogues.speaker: SUIT OF ARMOR
dialogues.text: Sir -- agh! -- Count Vladimir has -- agh! -- arrived. Reveal that Vlad is telekinetically causing the Suit to k himself.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Dad? Why are you doing that?

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: He didn’t know who I was. Are we ready to do this?

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: Yeah, come on, dude.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Fine, fine, just get the costume on, Brandon. Dad, I’1l be right with you. (to Frankenstein) Keep him away from...avis-May, and the...umans-hay.

dialogues.speaker: FRANKENSTEIN
dialogues.text: Ot it-gay. I’ll...ake sure he doesn’t know they’re humans in disguise-may.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Okay, your pig latin needs some work.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 99.

dialogues.speaker: FRANKENSTEIN
dialogues.text: Yeah, I failed it in high school. Sorry. Frankenstein takes Vlad over to his friends. FRANKENSTEIN (CONT’D) Hey, Count, lemme introduce you to some of the monsters. This is Murray...

dialogues.speaker: MURRAY
dialogues.text: Nice to meet you don’t hurt me.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Yipe. Were you buried that big or do you got a duck under that tape? To heaven with these dime store monsters. Where’s the family?

dialogues.speaker: FRANKENSTEIN
dialogues.text: Johnny!! Johnny comes over, scared. FRANKENSTEIN (CONT’D) This is Dracula’s son-in-law...

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Johnny?!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: (big accent) I...am Count Jonafang! Bleh blehhh - - blacksheep. Have you any...wool.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: What’s on your head? It looks like my grandmother’s boobies! Everyone laughs kiss-assedly but Vlad, stonefaced.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Not funny. Your generation is sick. Linda comes over.

dialogues.speaker: LINDA
dialogues.text: (flirty) Who is this dashing vampire?  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 100.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Well. Good evening. I’m the great- grandfather. And you --

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: (cutting them off) She’s a zombie. A real zombie!

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Mmmm...well, she looks hungry. Perhaps after this party we can go split a human...

dialogues.speaker: LINDA
dialogues.text: Oh, ho, well, it’s close to midnight... She starts to do her bad Thiller walk and Johnny immediat tackles her.

dialogues.speaker: LINDA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Johnny! Vlad looks perplexed as Dracula call over.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Two minutes, Dad!

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Ah, okay. Vlad walks over to the stage and starts setting up the ri sacrifice. Dracula is prepping the Cakey Guy, who’s almos costume.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Okay, we’re ready to go, just one more thing --

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: Make it quick.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Sure. You just have to stand in this one spot. The whole time. Dracula stands in one spot. Right in front of him, Vlad h just finished setting up thirteen red candles. Vlad mumbl to himself as he sprinkles some items...

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Mugwort...mustard seeds...ancient earth...blood...  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 101.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Hey, Frank, you might wanna leave.. (indicating candles) ...ire-fay.

dialogues.speaker: FRANKENSTEIN
dialogues.text: Oh...right...et me know when the sacrifice is over-lay. Dracula cringes. FRANKENSTEIN (CONT’D) Still not right?

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: Okay, one spot? That’s a nonstarter, dude. Cakey’s all about movement, and flow, I do the Cakey shuffle, it’s my big finish.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: I know, but it’s the acoustics. They can’t hear you unless you’re right here. See? Now -- He steps off the spot and fakes like he’s talking but wit sound. Mouths “you can’t hear me.) But now --” and steps

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You hear me perfectly. He demonstrates quickly a couple more times.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: Okay. None of these parents better review this on Yelp.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: You have my word as a Vampire.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: What does that mean?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Come on. A monster always shares.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: Whatever.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Johnny, start the show. Cakey time. Johnny has Linda in a headlock. He lets go.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 102.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Cakey? But I said the big kids won't like--

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: (nervous ) ‘kay, Drac! It’s all good, it’s all good. Kids, everyone, have a seat. You're gonna love this, because... Dennis has a big surprise for everyone. The one and only - Cakey the Cake Monster! Some younger kids cheer loudly (while the kids Dennis’ ag are less enthused) as Cakey enters and steps right on his mark.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY
dialogues.text: Hey kids! It’s me, Cakey! What a wonderful Cakey Day it is! The KIDS are mostly unimpressed except for a few small on and Winnie, who smiles encouragingly.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now, I have a question. Who here, loves cake?

dialogues.speaker: KIDS
dialogues.text: (mixed energy) Meeee... Vlad slowly starts walking on the stage.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: I love cake...

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: Whuh? Dude, what are you doin’ on my stage?

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Rise! Cakey levitates. He floats toward the candles.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, dude, what are you levitating me for? You’re ruining my flow.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Rise!!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 103. Suddenly Vlad intensifies the flames from the candles, wh form a circle around Cakey.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: Whoa, why the flames, man? This costume’s hot enough!

dialogues.speaker: COUSINS
dialogues.text: Yes! Awesome! Burn Cakey!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: You got ‘em right where you want them, Cakey! Crowd’s loving it!

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: You're freaking me out, man!

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: (concerned) Cakey? You okay?!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: What’s going on? Dracula gets nervous...

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Cast off the poison spirit of Cakey! “Beware!" scream the ravens of the night!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Johnny, who is that guy?!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Oh, it’s just your Dad’s, uh, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: What                         I have a grandfather?! The fires grow closer to Cakey! But Cakey can’t escape Vlad’s grip.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: Aaaaugghhh! Dude, put me down right now and you only have to pay half!

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: (ignoring him) Bring forth the Vampyre in this fangless child, that he may sustain your diabolic will for generations!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 104.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Cakey! No! Don’t hurt him!!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Stop it! Dracula extinguishes the flames to Vlad’s surprise. Every stares for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: CAKEY GUY
dialogues.text: ‘kay, I’m leaving! This was bogus! Realizing he’s still levitating, Cakey Guy starts “swimmi out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: What did you just do?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: It’s not worth it!!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: What’s not worth it?

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: I was trying one last time to make Dennis a vampire so you’d stay!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: By sacrificing Cakey!? How could you do that? When will you ever let go?

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Let go of what? Dennis won’t be happy in my town!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Dennis hasn’t been there!

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: I said we shouldn’t get Cakey...

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: You know he won’t fit in there!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Johnny, he’s not a monster!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: He’d rather be here!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: He likes avocado!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 105. As they argue, Dennis looks very uncomfortable.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Cuz he’s never eaten anything fun!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: He had fun with me!

dialogues.speaker: GRANDMA LINDA
dialogues.text: Johnny, I think Dennis just wants to be normal!

dialogues.speaker: GRAMPA MIKE
dialogues.text: Don’t say that! He is normal!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Can we stop using the word normal?

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Where we live now he’s normal! Suddenly, Dennis leaves and no one notices except Winnie. joins him and they run off.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: He really isn’t!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Well he won’t be happy there!

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: He is who he is! And you can’t change him!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: I don’t want to change him! I don’t care anymore if he’s a vampire! I just want you all to stay!

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: You don’t care about the shame he brings you? What’s become of you, son?

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Hey, back off, old man!!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Johnny, be cool.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 106.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DENNIS is running as fast as he can, not in any direction deep into the WOODS. He looks teary eyed. Winnie yells at

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: Dennis! The fort! Let’s go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny tosses off his wig in anger and gets in Vlad’s fac

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: You wanna throw down? Certified yellow belt since 1997!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: What’s this now? You’re not a vampire either?!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Uh...Bleh?

dialogues.speaker: GRAMPA MIKE
dialogues.text: Of course he’s not, he’s my son. You think we're monsters? Grampa Mike dumps his outfit. Vlad goes nuts at Dracula.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: You! You’ve ruined our bloodline! Thousands, of years, tossed in the trash!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: She...loves the guy. Mavis is frightened, but looks at Dracula with love and gratitude. He stood up for her love. Vlad’s face ROARS in the most fearsome manner we’ve seen Other S cower, their costumes falling off.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: This place! You let humans into our world!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Not originally...  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 107.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: This hotel must be extinguished! He screams, the echos summoning his Demonic Cronies, whos laughs we hear in the echoes. Everyone is terrified.

dialogues.speaker: FRANKENSTEIN
dialogues.text: I saw these guys. They’re insane. I know exactly what to do. (beat) Hide. Frankenstein dives under a couch which is half his size.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Johnny, grab Dennis! Dennis?

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: Dennis, buddy, where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie leads Dennis into her Dog Fort.

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: We'll be safe here. Forever. Dennis doesn’t say anything.

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Zing Zing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Demonic Cronies fly and run toward the Hotel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cronies burst in, smashing through all the ballroom windows and everyone is terrified. Frankenstein dismember out of shock. Dracula looks at Vlad, pissed.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Witness! Humans coexisting with Monsters! Sharing towels and spoons! The Cronies scream in anger and disbelief!

dialogues.speaker: VLAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Destroy it all!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 108. Gasps from patrons, then screams as all hell breaks loose The Cronies start flying around, ransacking the lobby, including some stuff set up for the party, like the bounc house, sending Dennis’ Mean Kid Cousins flying. Our Monst watch helplessly, including Wayne, Wanda, Murray and Grif

dialogues.speaker: MURRAY
dialogues.text: How do we stop these guys?!

dialogues.speaker: WANDA
dialogues.text: It’s horrible.

dialogues.speaker: GRIFFIN
dialogues.text: (regular voice) We have to do something! (high voice) Darling, you can’t leave me! (regular voice) I‘1ll never leave you, darling.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You can’t seriously be pulling this now.

dialogues.speaker: GRIFFIN
dialogues.text: What? I have a girlfriend.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Knights! Staff! Defend what is ours! Protect.our guests - monster and human!

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: (muttering to Dracula) You little brat. The Suits of Armor and Staff dutifully charge at the Cron Mavis is more nervous than ever about finding Dennis.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Dennis?? Honey, where are you

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winnie has brought Dennis into her dog fort. She shows hi row of CANS of Dog food.

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: Don't be sad, Dennis. Look, I even packed snacks to sustain us here for years. + eH + eH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 109. Dennis hears hubbub and looks out. More Demonic Cronies r right past their fort to the hotel! Dennis stands at the entrance.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: I think something bad’s happening. I think we need to go back.

dialogues.speaker: WINNIE
dialogues.text: If you think so, my zing. I’m right behind you! He gets up and she follows him as starts to hustle back albeit way slower than the Demonic Cronies. INT. BALLROOM —- MOMENTS LATER Mavis and Johnny are still looking for Dennis. The Cronie are jacking the Knights and make their way towards scream humans. Zombies try to defend and are wasted fast. They charge toward guests, ripping Ghost sheets from tables th was hiding humans. Monsters still try and defend - the Hu Fly buzzes around annoying a Cronys,The insanity busts ou ballroom and also partly into the lobby now. Now the Humans, including Johnny's family, start to battl the Cronies as well - getting weapons from the Suits of A and riding the Ghost Tables. They fight gallantly but onl Dracula is really able to neutralize a few, bailing the others out, and keeping the fight going. Vlad gets involv assisting his minions. Dracula uses his powers to block h repeatedly. They start telekinetically throwing things at each other. Then, suddenly, Dracula notices his powers ar gone.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: What’s the deal? Hey! Powers! Let’s go! Dracula looks over and sees Vlad with burning hypno-eyes.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Your powers are right here, boy. With me!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Daaaaad! That’s not fair!!

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Your Daddy knows what’s best for you!! ee + eH  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 110. Vlad waves and makes Dracula have a thumb in his mouth. Dracula angrily struggles to remove it but he can’t.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dennis and Winnie get to the hotel and run in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dennis and Winnie run into the lobby. With Dracula undone the Cronies are running wild, and actually starting to to around actual relatives and Monsters.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No, no! I said to destroy the hotel! Not the people! But they are out of control..they won’t listen. The Monst and Humans try their best to hold their ground. Vlad witnesses Johnny’s brother Brett dive to push Marty out o the way of a Crony’s blistering punches, taking one in th face. Vlad is stunned. * Dennis sees what’s happening and runs, forward. *

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Stop it! A few Cronies turn to see Dennis and start laughing at hi

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Leave them alone. A Crony ROARS at him and he recoils, but then gets back o his feet. Mavis spots Dennis and screams. *

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Dennis! Run! *

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: (hopefully, to himself) I'm a Bat...I’m a Bat... Dennis braces himself and jumps, flapping his arms - he t to fly at the Crony! But he falls flat, and they laugh ag

dialogues.speaker: DEMONIC CRONY
dialogues.text: What a joke! The Crony picks him up menacingly. *

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Dennis!  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 111. Mavis runs toward him and is grabbed by another Crony. Johnny is grabbed by yet another. MAVIS (CONT’D) Let go of me!

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: That’s our boy!

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Hey! Don’t touch my Mommy and Daddy!

dialogues.speaker: DEMONIC CRONY
dialogues.text: (in his face) Why not?

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: (scared) Cebause...

dialogues.speaker: DEMONIC CRONY
dialogues.text: (holding Mavis) Cebause what?

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Cebause I don’t want you to! Mavis, Johnny, and Dracula all watch with fear.

dialogues.speaker: DEMONIC CRONY
dialogues.text: Sorry, Curly, there's nothing you can do about it. Cebause you’re justa weak...little...boyyy. Dennis closes his eyes, summons up all his anger...and suddenly makes the fierce red eyed vampire face Dracula m and growls like Dracula! And then - bares fangs! Suddenly exploding with power, Dennis breaks free from th Demonic Crony and hurtles him with his mind, sending him flipping across the room! The other monsters attack Dennis and he defeats them in sequence, dodging them with super speed, pounding them wi super strength and making them freeze, rise, and smash in each other with mind control. Mavis and Johnny are set fr as a result. One Crony slams into Vlad, breaking Vlad’s concentration. Dracula seizes on it and regains his power Inspired, Mavis and Dracula join in the fight with renewe energy. Vlad watches and decides not to try and stop them Four more monsters approach Dennis.  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 112.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: There’s a mouse at the end of your butts! The Monsters chase their butts exactly like the Wolfpups The three of them continue kicking ass. They transform ba and forth into bats, whizzing too fast for the Demons and slamming them into stuff. Other monsters/humans are rallied and emboldened by the sudden turn of fate. They lay it on the cronies with righteous fury. Frank finally gets put back together and does something completely awesome. Wayne sics his wolf pack onto the cronies. Hearse without a driver comes crashing airborne through l windows all stunt style. Lands and careens and drifts thr lobby trashing cronies. Comes to a stop and..reveal it's Griffin driving! Even Vlad sees the sides working together, and finally ca help himself. He becomes a bat and joins in the fight against the Cronies. Finally, Dennis, in human form, lifts the last Monster an tosses him high into the air, bursting through the roof. Dennis raises his arms in celebration and lets out a roar The Demonic Cronies Fly away, terrified. As the last surviving minions flee we are left with a Magnificent 7-s line up in front of the hotel. Drac and Vlad back to back Mavis and Johnny, all the friends, Dennis in front of the all. Then, he and Mavis run to each other.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Mommy ! Mavis hugs Dennis. Johnny and Dracula run in.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Daddy! He hugs Johnny and looks at Dracula.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Papa! I’m a vampire!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: I don’t care, Dennis. I'm just glad you're my grandson. +e HF

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: +e * HF  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 113. Dracula hugs Dennis and sheds a tear.

dialogues.speaker: MAVIS
dialogues.text: Dad, I’m so sorry. You were right.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: No, baby, neither of us were right. We wanted to tell Dennis who he was, instead of letting him find out for himself.

dialogues.speaker: DENNIS
dialogues.text: Did you just call me Dennis?

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: (emotional) Yeah, he called you Dennis! He realizes he was wrong!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: (sarcastic, muttering) Yes. Only I was wrong.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Sacrificing that Cakey shlock wasn’t gonna change him. The thing he cherished was his family.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Yes, we get that.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: (to Dracula) And you...with this crazy hotel.

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Yeah, what about it?

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: I just saw a roomful of humans fighting for monsters. You made all of this possible. I’m proud of you, Count. Viva Hotel Transylvania!

dialogues.speaker: DRACULA
dialogues.text: Viva La Difference! Monsters and Humans together! Everyone cheers. Johnny looks at Vlad meaningfully.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: So...you approve of me?  HT2-RS/AS 3rd draft rev 4/11/14 114.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Yes, and all humans. I love you. Johnny tears up and presents Vlad with his backpack.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: I want you to have this. Vlad studies it and is weirded out.

dialogues.speaker: VLAD
dialogues.text: Uh, yeah..I don’t want it.

dialogues.speaker: JOHNNY
dialogues.text: (quickly grabbing it back) Oh, okay. I’1l take it back. Johnny closes his eyes and hugs it as we DISSOLVE TO...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We conclude with the BIRTHDAY PARTY with a full slew of h Monsters, s and Johnny’s Family dancing to SONG TO BE WRI over CLOSING CREDITS.
